summary: The 'Foreign Investment Guardrails to Help Thwart China Act of 2025' aims to protect U.S. national security by imposing sanctions and restrictions on certain investments in the People's Republic of China. It targets individuals and entities deemed national security risks, prohibits specific technology investments, and mandates reporting on investments related to “covered national security transactions.” The bill also addresses divestment from entities on the Non-SDN Chinese Military-Industrial Complex Companies List and promotes multilateral coordination with allies.
